overview: Australian born Nick Vujicic was born without arms or legs, but that has not stopped him from leading a full life. Now, 32 and founder of the Los Angeles-based nonprofit Life Without Limbs and a motivational speaker, he gives hope to those born with disabilities. Married with a 2-year-old son, Vujicic is the subject of a short documentary, "Born Without Limbs", to be aired on TLC on June 17. He shares his inspirational story with NBC's Sudan Donaldson James.
title: Born Without Limbs
